ai-patthana16.49:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.49:0.3_0: for the sake of healthy for the sake of a hundred years.
ai-patthana16.49:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause, without reservation, and with the cause, with the reason for the sake of not grasping there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.49:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.49:2.1_0: Not for the sake of not grasping, and for the sake of not offering the path, nor for the sake of repulsion, nor for the sake of being conditioned by causes and reasons.
ai-patthana16.49:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
